attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: At first, I was extremely excited to download this app so that I could keep track of all the important campaign events and receive text messages and such. But after downloading the app I found myself disappointed. The app wasnâ€™t user friendly at all. As someone who has grown up using technology, itâ€™s hard to imagine how someone of an older generation could be able to figure this app out. As a matter of fact, my grandparents have called me 7 times since they downloaded the app last Saturday to ask for assistance. The app is unorganized, complicated, and just doesnâ€™t represent the quality that I would expect from our president and his team at the White House.

attributes.title: Crashes Frequently!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to learn more about Donald Trumpâ€™s 2020 campaign. I quickly found out it was very hard to navigate. The app seemed cluttered. I could not find the information I was looking for. After going through it for a while, the app crashed and took me to the home screen.  I didnâ€™t really think anything of it and went back on. About 10 minutes later it crashed again. Every time I have used the app since, it has crashed. I know for a fact this is not my phone because my phone is new and this has never happened before. If you want to know more about his campaign I suggest you do your own research instead of using this bad app.
